title: Manager, Hospitality Entertainment & Gaming - Sports Management
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Manager, Hospitality Entertainment & Gaming   This person will be tasked to lead certain activities and projects working across key functional areas of the company with the goal of successful execution, delivering on time and within budget.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
